name: Mohamed Rizk
about_us_1: In a short time, our office has occupied a remarkable place among professional firms in Egypt and Dubai. This is because our firm has dedicated business professionals who possess and maintain standards of integrity and technical skills while caring for our clients.
about_us_2: M1 Group, for accounting, audit, Tax and Consultancy was established more than 16 years ago by a team of professionals with diverse experiences in the fields of auditing, tax services, regulation, administrative restructuring.
about_us_3: M1 Group audit, tax and consultancy facility relies on professional standards and quality levels through the facility’s partners and employees who have the appropriate academic qualifications.
about_us_4: As well as relying on the administrative and professional leaders in the governmental fields, where the facility works as ministerial agents in the former Central Auditing Organization and the former Director General of the Tax Authority, as well as advisers in the State Council previously, as well as those who have experience in the former Capital Market Authority.
mission_desc: We hope to obtain accounting solutions for small and large companies in addition to being licensed tax and providing our customers with peace of mind knowing that their financial money is taken care of without breaking the bank every month.
vision_desc:
Provide exceptional financial and professional services while maintaining the highest levels of integrity and professionalism.
Continue to provide an independent range of financial services, with a specific focus on our core market clients and their business interests.
Build a strong, deep and long lasting relationship with our clients to deliver the very best for them. With a distinctive partnership culture, we work together to achieve your goals.
objective_desc: Mohamed Rezk & Co. chartered accountants, consultants, and tax advisers – consistently strive to adhere to the highest professional standards, and provide sound advice to our clients while preserving our independence. We are open and honest in our communication and exchange of information in providing services and advice frequently and constructively with the management of difficult situations.
copy_writes_end: All Rights Reserved by M1 Group
our_services_sub: We provide a comprehensive range of services, expertise and advice whether you are looking for accounts, audit, tax returns, dedicated business support services or specialist advice.
say_something: Say something to start your Service
subject: Subject
contact_us_sub: Any question or remarks? Just write us a message!
faq_sub: Have any questions? We're here to assist you.
ourServiceDesc: Our team of experienced and dedicated professionals are committed to delivering expert guidance tailored to your individual needs.
ques_1: Will i have to see or speak to the internal revenue service if you take my case ?
ques_2: Is registration on the new system compulsory or optional for financiers?
answer_1: No, i will handle your case in its entirety and all the communication will be made directly through myself as an enrolled agent .
answer_2: Registration on the new system is compulsory for all financiers and registrants according to the schedule in force, both according to the phases allocated to the project. The first phase was applied to the financiers of the Center for Senior Financiers, the Center for Medium Financiers, and the Center for Senior Free Professions.
answer_3: Our fees for an Offer in Compromise are reasonably based on a flat rate and the terms of our engagement will be presented to you during your free initial consultation
address_eg: Egypt: 94 Abdelaziz fahmy st. Saint - fatima square, masr gadeda.
address_du: Dubai : Nada building, apartment no. 502, Al Barsha first street, Al Barsha1, Dubai
